executive_summary: Somnath Kshirsagar is a 43-year-old male with Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus (T1DM) diagnosed in 2021. His current HbA1c is 8.3%, indicating a need for improved glycemic control, alongside elevated LDL cholesterol levels and a light activity level that requires attention.

clinical_context.recent_events: Experiencing multiple episodes of DKA and hypoglycemia

labs_table.comment: Above target, indicating poor glycemic control
Total cholesterol is above optimal levels
LDL cholesterol is high, requiring intervention

interpretation.assessment: Current HbA1c is above the target for T1DM, indicating a need for better management.
interpretation.plan: Consider insulin regimen adjustment and education on carbohydrate counting.

interpretation.assessment: LDL levels are significantly above the target, increasing cardiovascular risk.
interpretation.plan: Initiate lifestyle changes and consider statin therapy.

interpretation.assessment: Current activity level is insufficient for optimal health.
interpretation.plan: Encourage increased physical activity to improve overall health and glycemic control.

lifestyle_plan.text: Increase physical activity to at least 150 minutes of moderate exercise per week.
Reduce alcohol intake to no more than 14 units per week.
Quit smoking to reduce cardiovascular risk.

diet_plan.principles: Follow a low-carb diet focusing on whole foods, lean proteins, and healthy fats.
sample_meals: Grilled chicken salad with olive oil dressing
diet_plan.portion_guidance: Aim for balanced portions with a focus on low glycemic index foods.

monitoring_plan.glucose_targets: Aim for pre-meal glucose levels between 4-7 mmol/L.
monitoring_plan.testing_frequency: Test blood glucose at least 4 times a day.
monitoring_plan.safety_checks: Regularly check for signs of hypoglycemia and adjust insulin as needed.

patient_goals: Reduce LDL cholesterol to < 2.0 mmol/L within 3 months
Increase physical activity to 150 minutes per week within 3 months

medication_plan.text: Consider starting a statin for LDL management.

follow_up.actions: Reassess HbA1c, lipid profile, and lifestyle changes.

emr_note: Patient is a 43-year-old male with T1DM, currently with an HbA1c of 8.3%, elevated LDL, and light activity level. Recommendations include lifestyle modifications, potential statin therapy, and regular monitoring.
